address: 2200 North Ocean Boulevard, Myrtle Beach, SC, USA

nearbyCategories.description: Enjoy casual dining with breathtaking ocean views, many within a 5-10 minute drive. Options include seafood at 'Sea Captain's House' or Italian at 'Villa Romana Italian Restaurant'.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a family enjoying a meal at an outdoor restaurant patio overlooking a sunny beach and the ocean in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. Focus on the vibrant colors and the relaxed atmosphere.

nearbyCategories.description: Grab a quick coffee or pastry at nearby cafes, many within a 5-minute drive. Check out 'Starbucks' or a local option like 'Dunkin''.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: High-resolution, photorealistic image of a brightly lit coffee shop interior in Myrtle Beach. Show customers ordering coffee, baristas preparing drinks, and a display of pastries. Focus on warm lighting and inviting ambiance.

nearbyCategories.description: Explore popular attractions like 'Broadway at the Beach' (15-minute drive) or the 'Myrtle Beach SkyWheel' (10-minute drive) for fun and entertainment.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the Myrtle Beach SkyWheel at sunset, with the colorful lights illuminated against the twilight sky. Show the surrounding boardwalk area with people strolling and enjoying the view.

nearbyCategories.description: Engage in water sports or visit amusement parks for thrilling experiences. 'Myrtle Waves Water Park' is a 20-minute drive.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: A dynamic, photorealistic image of people enjoying various water slides and attractions at Myrtle Waves Water Park under a clear blue sky. Show the excitement and energy of the water park setting.

nearbyCategories.description: Find a variety of stores and boutiques at shopping centers like 'Coastal Grand Mall' (20-minute drive) or explore local shops closer by.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of shoppers browsing stores at Coastal Grand Mall in Myrtle Beach. Capture the variety of stores, the architectural design of the mall, and the general shopping atmosphere.

nearbyCategories.category: Convenient Grocery and Essential Item Stores
nearbyCategories.description: Easily access groceries and essentials at nearby convenience stores, such as 'Walgreens' within walking distance or 'Walmart' a short drive away.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: A well-lit, photorealistic image of the interior of a Walgreens store in Myrtle Beach, showing aisles stocked with groceries, toiletries, and over-the-counter medications. Focus on cleanliness and organization.

nearbyCategories.description: Convenient access to 'Myrtle Beach International Airport' (MYR), approximately a 15-minute drive for easy travel arrangements.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the exterior of Myrtle Beach International Airport (MYR) during the day, showing the terminal building, airport signage, and airplanes taking off or landing. Capture the bustling atmosphere of the airport.

nearbyCategories.category: Golf Courses and Mini Golf Adventures
nearbyCategories.description: Tee off at nearby golf courses like 'Dunes Golf and Beach Club', or enjoy family fun at mini-golf courses, all within a 15-minute drive.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: A lush, photorealistic image of a golf course in Myrtle Beach, with a golfer teeing off against a backdrop of green fairways, sand bunkers, and palm trees. Focus on the natural beauty of the golf course landscape.

nearbyCategories.category: Beach Access Points and Oceanfront Parks
nearbyCategories.description: Easy access to the beach directly across North Ocean Boulevard and oceanfront parks for relaxation and recreation.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a sunny day on Myrtle Beach. Show the beach with people relaxing, playing in the sand, and swimming in the ocean. Include the iconic lifeguard stands and a clear blue sky.

nearbyCategories.description: Several car rental agencies, including 'Hertz' and 'Enterprise', are available within a short drive (10-15 minutes) from the property.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a car rental lot in Myrtle Beach, showing a variety of rental cars available for customers. Include the car rental agency building and signage in the background.
